text: Do you have enough resources to pay for the very basics like food, housing, and medical care?
Do you have any significant outstanding bills or debts?
Do you want help finding work or keeping work or a job?

options.text: I do not need or want help

text: Do you want help with school or training? For example, starting or completing job training or getting a high school diploma, GED or equivalent?
What is your housing situation today?

options.text: I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future
I do not have a steady place to live

text: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

options.text: Pests such as bugs, ants, or mice
Smoke detectors missing or not working

text: In the past 12 months has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?
Within the past 12 months, were you worried whether your food would run out before you got money to buy more?
Within the past 12 months the food you bought just didn't last and you didn't have money to get more. Was this:
Have you experienced difficulty getting needed services because you do not have transportation?
